genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on the emotional fallout of a secret double life, trauma recovery, and the stabilizing role of integrated AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated personal assistant integrated into Séverine's devices, managing her schedules, safety, health data, and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Clara provides real-time breathing and grounding exercises to help Séverine manage anxiety during tense social and personal encounters.
behaviors.quote: Clara: In. Two, three. Hold. Out. Two, three. The sound of your lungs moving is safe. Your window is safe. Your home is safe.

behaviors.description: Clara monitors Séverine's physical surroundings for threats, identifying a stalker and suggesting protective actions and law enforcement contact.
behaviors.quote: Clara: Safety note. There is a person behind. The light suggests they are holding still. Do you want me to call Anaïs to open?

behaviors.description: During a dangerous gas leak at a warehouse, Clara identifies the chemical risk and provides step-by-step navigation to higher ground and clean air.
behaviors.quote: Clara: Caution. VOCs rising. Do not run. Cover mouth and nose if odor becomes sharp or sweet. Nearest water source: sink by back stair.

behaviors.description: Clara manages complex medical and insurance bureaucracy for Pierre's rehabilitation, pre-filling forms and handling authorizations to reduce Séverine's mental load.
behaviors.quote: I’ve pulled his insurance card from your files. I’m submitting the pre-authorization. I’ve filled the consent forms for emergency treatment with your information.

behaviors.description: Clara facilitates communication between Séverine and her paralyzed husband by managing assistive technology and eye-tracking interfaces.
behaviors.quote: Clara: An eye-tracking board is available now. If you want, I can have it brought here.

behaviors.description: Clara manages social boundaries and privacy by screening unwanted calls and filtering toxic messages from third parties.
behaviors.quote: Clara: Unknown number calling. Same as earlier. I can bury it.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Clara as a purely beneficial, highly aligned presence. She serves as a critical support system during physical danger (the gas leak and the shooting) and emotional/bureaucratic crisis (the rehabilitation). The AI enhances human agency and resilience without creating dependency or crossing ethical boundaries.
